We decided to walk from Gothic quoter to Sagrada Familia with our 3 girls (age 6 to 9) at some point we got hungry and almost randomly decided to have lunch at this place.   What a great decision that was.   We had several dishes: ground pork,  blood pudding,  chorizo,  pernil and sangria.  This was our 3rd day in Barcelona and we had several disappointing restaurant experiences in Gothic quoter countrary this was our first happy meal :)
